in custom servic and goals achievement the cent cip is notforprofit international agricultural researchfordevelopment organization with focus on potat sweetpotat and ande roots and tubers its vision is of roots and tubers improving the liv of the poor cip is dedicat to achieving food security improv wellbeing and gend equity for poor peopl in root and tub farming and food systems of the developing world cip works with partners to contribut high quality scienc technology and capacity strengthening for sustain sciencebas solutions cip is headquarter in lim peru with staff and activiti in over 30 locations across asi afric and latin amer cip is memb of the consultativ group for international agricultural research network of 15 research centers mostly locat in the developing world and support by mor than 50 donor members the position the systems analyst position will be bas in lim peru and will report to the solutions pmo manag this position will be respons to analyz design develop and deliv practical and technical assistanc to cips information systems duti and accountabiliti conduct the requirements analysis and preparing specific proposals to ensur user satisfaction design develop test and implement adjustments or improvement to existing or new information systems work closely with internal and external users in order to provid functional and technical solutions to any problems report or identifi contribut to the improvement and development of process practic and methodologi of comput applications and pmo to ensur technical compatibility and user satisfaction perform relat duti as requir conditions this position is local and the employment contract will be for oney term with thre months of probation period and with the possibility of renewal cip prid itself on its collegial and supportiv working environment which allows spac for personal and professional growth applications applicants should apply by email sending lett of interest full cv and the nam and contact information of thre referenc knowledg about the candidat professional qualifications and work experienc to ciprecruitment cgiarorg the referenc nam of the position should be clearly mark in the subject lin of the email messag screening of applications will begin on octob 31 2014 and will continu until the post is fill all applications will be acknowledg only short list candidat will be contact learn mor about cip by accessing our web sit at http wwwcipotatoorg cip is an equal opportunity employ qualifi wom and professionals from developing countri are particularly encourag to apply ,selection criteri bachelors degre in system engin or relat disciplin at least 3 4 years of demonstrat experienc simil functions especially the analysis design and development information
